headline: Watch Jim Jordan Shred Racist Black Dem, Val Demings, In Shouting Match On Police Reform- It’s Beyond EPIC
author: AFF NEWSWIRE- CHLOE
sentences:
By Leisa Audette at 100Percent FED Up –
Democrat Val Demings and Republican Jim Jordan got into a shouting match during a House Judiciary Committee hearing regarding a bill that would block defunding police.

WATCH:
It’s no surprise that Rep. Demings was interviewed on MSNBC, where she was grandstanding and bloviating about the incident with Rep. Jordan.
Ironically, Demings slammed Republicans, accusing them of using law enforcement officials as pawns to advance their political agenda.
Remember that this is the same police chief who left her service weapon unsecured in her car and had it stolen by the bad guys.
